programme.title: Master Crimes

programme.desc: Louise and her students investigate a case where two young girls are found in the forest.

programme.sub-title: Master Crimes: Bad Swan (Season 1 Episode 6)
programme.desc: A night at the opera is interrupted when the prima ballerina crashes to the ground.

programme.title: The Art of Crime
programme.sub-title: The Art of Crime: Blood Dance, Part 1 (Season 4 Episode 3)
programme.desc: A Moulin Rouge dancer comes under suspicion for a murder.

programme.title: Homicide Hills
programme.sub-title: Homicide Hills: Sophie, Come, Everyone (Sn 3 Ep 13)
programme.desc: The village Santa Claus disappears the day before Christmas.

programme.title: Magellan
programme.sub-title: Magellan: The Terrible Teens (Sn 3 Ep 4)
programme.desc: Inspector and family man Simon Magellan unravels crimes and mysteries in the fictional French town of Saignac. Someone kills a principal who tried to clean up problems at his school. French with English subtitles.

programme.title: Don Matteo
programme.sub-title: Don Matteo: The Power of a Smile (Sn 5 Ep 8)
programme.desc: Don Matteo is a thoroughly ordinary Catholic priest with an extraordinary ability to solve crimes. The Marshal accidentally runs over a boy and starts visiting the hospital every day to amuse him, Patch Adams style. Italian with English subtitles.

programme.title: Don Matteo
programme.sub-title: Don Matteo: The Stranger (Sn 1 Ep 1)
programme.desc: Don Matteo is a thoroughly ordinary Catholic priest with an extraordinary ability to solve crimes. Don Matteo investigates when a Croation laborer is found dead in the factory where he works. Italian with English subtitles.

programme.title: Don Matteo
programme.sub-title: Don Matteo: True Fakes (Sn 5 Ep 4)
programme.desc: Don Matteo is a thoroughly ordinary Catholic priest with an extraordinary ability to solve crimes. A valuable painting has been stolen, and suspicions fall on its young owner. Italian with English subtitles.

programme.title: Detective Montalbano
programme.sub-title: Detective Montalbano: The Scent of the Night (Sn 1 Ep 9)
programme.desc: Murder, betrayal, temptation…it's all in a day's work for Detective Montalbano. A financial wizard disappears with money entrusted to him by the people of Montelusa. Italian with English subtitles.

programme.title: Detective Montalbano
programme.sub-title: Detective Montalbano: Merry Go Round (Sn 1 Ep 31)
programme.desc: Murder, betrayal, temptation…it's all in a day's work for Detective Montalbano. A series of bizarre kidnappings, the arson of an antique store and the disappearance of its playboy owner. All in one episode! Italian with English subtitles.

programme.title: Don Matteo
programme.sub-title: Don Matteo: That Was My Daughter (Sn 8 Ep 1)
programme.desc: While Don Matteo investigates the attempted murder of an antique dealer, he finds himself taking care of Laura, a rebellious adolescent who is expecting a baby.

programme.title: Petra
programme.sub-title: Emissaries of Darkness
programme.desc: After appearing on a TV show, Petra receives a nasty surprise.
